website_summaries.verdict: Whether you're recovering from injury or hoping to avoid one, these affordable sleeves will keep your knees warm and well supported.
pros: Features a contoured design for a better fit and extra stability
Thick neoprene construction provides good compression and warmth without limiting movement
Doesn't shift or slip during training
Easy to get on and off
cons: Some owners feel the sizes run small and report pinching at the hems

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a lifesaver to me. I am close to having a knee replacement and with wearing this fantastic knee sleeve, I am hoping to put it off for awhile. It may sound weird, but with this sleeve on it seems to hold my knee in place. I know at least 2 or 3 times this has helped to keep me from going down. I wear it all day. Yes, it fits snug, but I think it is supposed too. If you are un decided, go ahead and buy it. You WON'T be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: margaret conlon

customer_reviews.title: Really good! I'm extremly happy with them.
customer_reviews.text: I've suffering from knee issues for a while, and a bad movement while sprinting made it worse. My physiotherapist recommended me to get rely on a bandage or a really good neoprene knee sleeves. After recovering, I started using them for all my sports activities and I can feel, I'm well supported. Sudden twists or changes of direction while sprinting do not affect my knee as before. I thought they would cause issues to move while running but that is not the case. I know this is probably not the regular way other users have been using it. But they did the trick for me and I'm so glad I found them.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Moreno

customer_reviews.title: they are great quality and it was a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very new to CrossFit, but what a huge difference in my squats. They are a little tight, my knee measured 17" exactly, so I went with the XL because I was afraid the 2XL would be to loose. There is a seam that goes down the back that is a little uncomfortable, but I am hoping that goes away after I use them a little more. Besides that, they are great quality and it was a great purchase! Would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good blend of fit and performance.
customer_reviews.text: Love these knee braces. They are a nice tight fit but aren't too restrictive. I'm an older crossfitter and these have worked really well in the few weeks I've had them. I was waffling between a four and five star rating simply for the fact that I got them in gray and that color shows dirt and sweat really badly. Ultimately I still gave them five stars because this is more of aesthetic issue rather than function but I'd recommend a darker color.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W Armbrister

customer_reviews.title: These are just what my knees needed!
customer_reviews.text: These compression sleeves are JUST WHAT MY KNEES NEEDED! I am 62 years old and enjoy a good hour on my treadmill everyday although my knees are a little creaky and prone to pain. I have tried various types of knee braces, but they do not provide the comfort and relief from pain that the compression sleeves do. I just bought another pair for my wife whom I am sure needs them even more than me and will like them just as much. Update - I am ordering a second pair as backup for when I travel! Forgot them last week and got a reminder of the stiffness and pain I had before I started using these.
customer_reviews.author: William W. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Best knee sleeves
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing, I find I can go heavy and longer whether you go lite or heavy. Maybe its my mind but they Mava products really knows their customer and their needs. Hats off to a well brand company and the product/s they have to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Never to old to be fit.

customer_reviews.title: my knees are not great. When I was doing squats
customer_reviews.text: So, I'm old, fat and 50. Let's start Cross fit! Yeah . . . I'm one of THOSE lunatics. Having been obese most of my adult life, my knees are not great. When I was doing squats, it sounded like bubble wrap! Using these helped make proper form and healthy mobility a possibility. Get them if you need them. They help.
customer_reviews.author: M. D. MCBRIDE

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am a 37 year old former 2 sport college athlete and played everything growing up. My knees have obviously taken a beating over the years. I've been physically unable to do anything more than air squats for the last year. My knees would pop, burn and swell if I tied. A guy from the Crossfit games swore by them. I figured what the heck. I couldn't be more happy. It was kind of emotional to be able to do something again you hadn't been able to. Oh, my knees were fine the next day! Now my quads, hamstrings and calves... not so much! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Dan Kiley

customer_reviews.title: Best knee sleeves out there !
customer_reviews.text: Ever since received my knee sleeves I used this right away and my knees never felt better after leg day! Should have purchased them sooner
customer_reviews.author: Jasmyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Repeat Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first pair of Mava knee compression sleeves just over six months ago. I purchased them for crossfit and powerlifting purposes. I would occasionally use them for sprinting or 5k runs. I just purchased a second pair in a different color so that I could use them to run the NYC Marathon. They stayed in position without fail for the entire race. They provided much needed support and stability for the event. I also believe they were instrumental in my rapid recovery immediately following the marathon. Truly outstanding in quality, both before and after my marathon.
customer_reviews.author: Fred_A

customer_reviews.title: Great product but weird sizing!
customer_reviews.text: These sleeves fit waaaay too small. I measured my knee circumference as described and my measurements were between small and medium so I ordered a medium. I have normal sized calves and it won't go up past them!! How is it supposed to fit my thighs? It seems to be great and made well but I probably need an x large?? I wear size 2 pants and Size small shirts so I'm not an XL person... It's like Asian sizing!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: High quality product... competitive, reasonable pricing
customer_reviews.text: They are real good using them for a month now... high build quality... good warmth... very very competitive pricing.... totally worth the buy... would highly recommend it... customer support is legendary.... u can approachbmava team for anything n they will tale care of you... now that money cant buy....
customer_reviews.author: Kelso

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these knee sleeves everyday for a week now with outstanding response. Many years ago I tore my left meniscus and due to having no insurance I was not able to afford the surgical repair so for several years the torn meniscus caused much degeneration in the joint. Eventually I did get the meniscus repaired but the damage done was permanent. This knee sleeve by Mavagear is the best compression support yet, and over the years I have tried about 20. In general, compression helps me to stay active and I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: ... new Mava support a couple times but it’s substantially better than any brace I’ve used before
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used my new Mava support a couple times but it’s substantially better than any brace I’ve used before. I damaged my knee 15 years ago in a motorcycle crash. On top of that I was a police officer for 9 years and had the street name “Running Man”. That says it all. My knees took a toll over the years and this support is hands down the best I’ve ever used. It’s teue support, high quality, and heavy duty. Hands down one of the best purchases I’ve made in awhile. Don’t tell my wife I said so, because she’s the one who found and recommended it!! Haha
customer_reviews.author: Ron Belote

customer_reviews.title: alot of support
customer_reviews.text: im still using them. got them for a meniscus repair in one knee & trying not to have surgery in other. very stiff! thicker even than what u expect. im using them for jui jitsu classes, im always on my knees, lots of movement. a lot of support, they re not "breaking" down because of use or washing. they fit like when i 1st bought them. use the size chart offered in description, order size they recommend. would reccomend, i will order them again if the need arize s.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Complete Junk BUYER BE AWARE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are complete junk and there are several reasons why. 1) Sizing is all wrong. I measured like they suggested and the ones I received are a huge pain to get over the knee and pull up. 2) These things are super thick and restrict movement of the joint which in fact can cause join injury. 3) They have a plastic type center such as those found on a "sauna belt". Because of this moisture is not wicked away during workout resulting in rashes and irritation from your sweat. 4) Stitching is already coming undone as shown by previous reviews and I have had them ONE DAY! 5) Non-returnable All in all I would NOT recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Steere

customer_reviews.title: best knee sleeves I've owned
customer_reviews.text: after trying a few other brands, I bought my wife her first knee sleeves from Mava, she loved them right away so much that I bought my own pair. I get mine a little tight for extra support and this did not disappoint. good fit and provided support on my biggest lifts, a 1500lb leg press and doing farmers walk. definitely my new favorites, gonna get the elbow sleeves next.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan T

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I haven't trained with knee wraps/sleeves in years. Recently I began having some knee issues that required several trips to my physical therapist. I ordered a pair of these sleeves to use for my workouts, which I continued during my treatments. These things are very comfortable and seem like they will hold up for a long time. They are so comfortable in fact, I purchased a second pair to wear while working. At work, I have been able to wear them for 12 hours at a clip, without any issues. I will most likely keep wearing them during my workouts, just to give more support to my 43 year old, battered knees. Thanks for a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and useful
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bigger guy working to lose weight, but the added stress on my knees makes it difficult. These sleeves really minimize the discomfort I feel while I'm working out, which is important because things like knee pain can really demotivate someone when they're trying to establish a good workout habit. My only gripe would be that I have to adjust the sleeve on my left from time to time but it's not to the point where it gets in the way of my workout, it's nothing more than a minor inconvenience. These sleeves provide great support and are comfortable enough to wear for a couple of hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great lower priced option for competition
customer_reviews.text: I am competing in my first ever USPA meet this weekend, and I needed some sleeves (I normally use the MAVA wraps with velcro, which is not allowed in USPA competition). These arrived quickly and fit great. They are also 1/2 the price of the recommended brands I researched online. I have several sets of MAVA knee compression sleeves which I wear for walking, and working out, and they are also great products.
customer_reviews.author: JimNH

customer_reviews.title: Provides comfortable support
customer_reviews.text: Being in my mid 40s I am starting to have knee pains especially when weightlifting, mostly squats and deadlifts. These did help alleviate the pain to the extent that it is mostly nonexistent now. Keep in mind, I have changed other things in my daily life that help as well. But, there is noticeable difference in using these. Also, I measured following the directions and my size landed right in the middle of the size chart. They fit perfectly as far as I know. This is my first time ever using compression knee sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FELL APART AFTER 3 USES
customer_reviews.text: The stitching on these Knee Sleeves started coming apart at the back of the sleeve after my fiance had used them only 3 times. We tried to contact their customer support directly to see if they would make the situation right, but they never responded to our request. If you want to spend $40 on sleeves that you can use in the gym three times, this is the product for you! If you'd like ones that are quality and will last, stay away from Mava.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie E.

customer_reviews.title: I am thoroughly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Came with manufacturer defect in the sewing - tried to contact company via email to rectify but got no response. I can understand a product getting through quality control but aside from returning them, I have not gotten any other options to ameliorate the situation. I am thoroughly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Darren MacNaughton

customer_reviews.title: Most excellent
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit miffed that this small product would take a week to get to me. So I cancelled my order. Then just a couple days later, the product arrived soo I checked them out. Looked quality so I tried them on. I've never before worn knee support. WHY? I have no idea. Young and old should wear this during activities. So no...I'm not sending them back and I am now buying my wife a pair too.
customer_reviews.author: Jam1

customer_reviews.title: I've had them for less than 2 months and they've torn from the top already.
customer_reviews.text: I thought these sleeves were great until recently. I've had them for less than 2 months and they've torn from the top already. I'm sure it's from constantly pulling them up/on. I do like them quite snug for best support while crossfit. And it may be my pant leggings that cause them to slip so often, it may be the type of workouts, constant movement, not sure. Either way I'm disappointed. I was loving them, couldn't be in the gym without them. Time to try different ones.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: My Second Pair!! Fantastic Knee Support!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: “I suggest ordering a size lower than what you think you are. But these knee sleeves are amazing. I feel a lot more stable when I wear these for squatting and leg presses. I freaking love these things. Highly suggest you purchase these as my buddy did too and he loves them as well.” My statement from my first review still holds true. Beginner, Intermediate, or Pro; these knee sleeves get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: Measurements are incorrect, if you are a Medium try an XL
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item in a medium and it didn’t move above my calf, i got a refund as soon as I returned the product and ordered a large and received it today. It didn’t fit above my knee. The company has been great about refunding my money however, I would suggest maybe changing the measurement details as they seem to be way off. The quality and feel of the product is great though, I’m disappointed neither of them fitted.
customer_reviews.author: Jia

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: These knee compression sleeves are great, I have "jumpers knee" healing up. I use these during kickboxing classes, and it gives the needed support so I can kick them bags! Comfort - Overall fantastic, the thickness of the sleeve keeps the knees warm, but with jump squats, mountain climbers, etc, it feels thick behind the knee. I don't mind, because it reminds me that I am wearing them so that I don't overdue it.
customer_reviews.author: J-Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great support, but not durable
customer_reviews.text: These knee sleeves were great, provided great support and comfort during my crossfit wods. But last week I noticed they were starting to tear after only having them close to 2 months. Very sad bc I was starting to love them.
customer_reviews.author: KW17

customer_reviews.title: Functionally great
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. I do have joint pain I take meds for, and these are great for relieving some of the pain during work outs. It took a couple tries to adjust them correctly during my first use of them, but nothing anyone couldn’t deal with. Only defect, if barely, I’ve noticed so far is that the logo on one of the sleeves was peeling off mid workout. Functionally, these are great. If you care about the logo being pristine, eh.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy N.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The knee sleeves are very supportive. I chose this brand because I had a pair that lasted maybe 1 year. However I noticed the sleeves are already starting to tear on the inside. I measured for the right size and I’ve only worn them 3 times since purchasing. I’m concerned they’ll tear from the inside out like the pair I previously had. And the MAVA logo has already rubbed off. Maybe I just need to order a more expense brand for squatting idk.
customer_reviews.author: Candice W

customer_reviews.title: Probably Better for Weight Training
customer_reviews.text: The knee compression sleeves are exactly as advertised, however, I'm using them for recovery from long-distance cycling, and as such, they're a little thick/heavy for my needs. But they do provide excellent compression, and I have no doubt they'd be excellent for weight training. I had previously used the Tommie Copper knee compression sleeves and found that they lose their shape/elasticity after repeated use. I can't imagine ever wearing out a set of the Mava sleeves: they are very well-constructed. I do have to remove the sleeves periodically and give my knees a breather. Being neoprene, they are hotter than the knit/lycra sleeves, but that is to be expected using that material.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Taylor

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for....
customer_reviews.text: These are thick and provide good support while squatting. I had Rehband 5mm and they lost there umph so I figured I try the 7mm and these received good reviews. I got the sizing correct but the bulge and slip no matter where i put them. The bulge hurts on certain lifts such as the leg press. The help me more on my squats but again I have to constantly pull them up and adjust all throughout the workout. I recommend spending the extra money on a different product such as 7mm Rehbands, SBD or any other "high rated" knee sleeves
customer_reviews.author: KopShow22

customer_reviews.title: These knee sleeves are great. This is my second and third pair and ...
customer_reviews.text: These knee sleeves are great. This is my second and third pair and I love them. Plus they are half the price of comparable brands, which makes it a no-brainer. I use them for squats and Olympic lifting and I can not find anything to complain about. The provide the right amount of support and compression without feeling cumbersome or uncomfortable. If/when these reach the end of their usefulness I'll definitely be purchasing Mava knee sleeves again!
customer_reviews.author: ABT

customer_reviews.title: Knee Sponge
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for squats and deadlifts, they definitely help keep a more solid range of motion and even seem to give me a boost for lifting more weight. Only complaint is they are like sponges and soak and retain sweat, and a lot of it! When you remove them it's kinda hard because they're wet!
customer_reviews.author: TaintedProbes

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeves!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great knee sleeves, they work fine! I was worried about them tearing but they are holding up just fine, really durable... I use them for Olympic lifting and for heavy squatting, they offer great support and warm my knees up pretty significantly. The white logos on the front didn’t last that long for they peeled off before I could even use them but I honestly didn’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rouhi

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT product with impressive support provided by the Vendor
customer_reviews.text: I tend to ignore requests from Amazon for product reviews that arrive before I've even had time to use them but this vendor anticipated questions I would have & provided valuable information on how to use and care for it properly which was much appreciated. The compression knee sleeve consistently provided the needed support I required to stabilize my knee while a torn meniscus healed and adapted as predicted to allow it to be comfortable. I am especially grateful for the separate email instructions that the company provided and encouragement to contact them with any questions.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: The size chart did not work for me.  But everyone is different.
customer_reviews.text: I went by the size chart. It indicated I needed a large. I feel the large is not snug enough. Tried to order a medium but this item is sold out. I attempted to contact Mava with negative results ( I tried by phone and email). I was trying to find out when Mava or Amazon would get this item in stock. So far I have kept the Mava knee sleeves and have ordered the Spartan knee sleeve from Amazon. If the Spartan knee sleeves fit correctly I will return the Mava knee sleeves. The Mava knee sleeves appear to be very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: issues - size and latex allergy
customer_reviews.text: 1. if you're on the upper end of a size, go up one size more as this is very, very tight 2. nowhere does it say latex in the description but if you're allergic to latex on your skin, i'm guessing neoprene is the same material because i ended up with severe itchy swollen welts for several days after trying it out.
customer_reviews.author: tmbrbeest

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this for last 2 weeks, ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for last 2 weeks, only for 2 hrs max (it is troublesome to wear more than that much time). Now the sleeve has almost lost its elasticity, the feel i had for the first few days is gone. Not sure if it is something to do with set i got, but it is certainly not lasting even a month.
customer_reviews.author: NK Indy

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised for weight lifting!
customer_reviews.text: I just got the items arrived earlier then advised which was great! I used them for my leg work out which was the main reason for them, the fit seems to be perfect I used on the exercise with the most load on my knees leg press I was able to do reps with 600,700 and 800lbs was using leg wraps for this not any more very helpful for this kind of weight. Hoping to get this kind of support when I do my squats. Very good product so for.
customer_reviews.author: Verified purchaser

customer_reviews.title: These are great, heavyweight knee sleeves!
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to knee sleeves. These are nice and thick and I like them for the heavy squatting lifts. I feel that my knees are very well supported. Whenever it is time for a new pair, I look directly to Mava. Also, the Mava customer support is exceptional, so if you have any issues what-so-ever, they will make it right!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: T H I C C means not meant for running, otherwise very supportive
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these with the intention of providing extra stability for runs but these are too thick for that purpose. That said, these knee sleeves appear to be extremely supportive and comfortable for other activities such as weight training. Just make sure you buy them for their intended purpose! Also, the designs are quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: drvck

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: I recently started some intense cardio and jumping routines, and my knees DID NOT like that at all. My left knee especially started swelling like I've never experienced before. I ordered this sleeve very hopeful that it would help. Combined with stretching and keeping it on for hours, my knee got better. Greatly reduced swelling, and mitigates future swelling and pain. I wear it during my training now, and leave it on for about an hour after. Now I don't have any issues with my knees at all. I don't know how it does what it does, but it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, slightly questionable though
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these before and the new ones are slightly bigger than those that were the same size. So, idk? I mean Mava makes great products, but not sure why if I ordered the same size that these are bigger? Trust me, I don’t miss leg day!
customer_reviews.author: SiKwAyZ

customer_reviews.title: Gives him the best support and confidence when he is working out...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my hubby who is very picky about knee braces. He loves them! Says they give him the best support and confidence when he is working out and lifting. My 70 year old Mom thought they were awesome and wants a pair for herself! Great product! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MamaKatz

customer_reviews.title: Keeps knees warm and adds stability
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son. Keeps the knees very warm and adds stability when he is squatting. They are very high quality and the size chart helps get the perfect size. Will buy a set for the rest of the family.
customer_reviews.author: Nimnyc76

customer_reviews.title: Order larger if you have big calves
customer_reviews.text: I measured my thigh per the instructions and ordered the appropriate size for the measurement. The problem is that I have genetically huge calves. It fits everywhere else properly, but it cuts off the circulation in my calf and makes my ankle swell. It's good quality, etc., and seems like it will last a long time, but the fabric is pretty uncomfortable next to my skin (scratchy, not soft).
customer_reviews.author: Coconut Earth Monkey

customer_reviews.title: I am no longer a skeptic
customer_reviews.text: As a 43 year old woman wanting to keep working out during this pandemic, these knee braces are helping a ton. I have always had issues getting my left glute to engage and figured out it was because my body was used to letting my left knee cave in...no longer...these really work at keeping that knee from doing that. I did get these at the hottest time of the year here in MN; so they need to be hand washed already (only three uses), but they are working great. Also bought a couple pair of shorts, so I can use them comfortably in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ripped at seam after 30-ish uses...
customer_reviews.text: Used the product approximately 30 times, over a 4 month period, and only for heavy squats. It ripped at the seam and Mava said they only warranty products for 30 days. Won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: The sleeves are premium quality and fit perfectly. They offer optimal support as well as comfort. Great for lifts as well as aiding in recovery. They require little time to put on and are easy to transport. They also dry quickly after use.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Lilakos

customer_reviews.title: Using for recovery from patella fracture
customer_reviews.text: fit well. My knee measured the exact size at the end of an XL (17") - the same as the beginning range of the XXL. I went with the XL. They are tight, but not too tight. I have a patella fracture that occurred last summer and my knee is pretty weak still. This helps a lot on my leg day at the gym. very well made too.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the expensive brand
customer_reviews.text: I have one Rehband knee sleeve. I needed one for the other leg. Instead of paying this much for one more of that, I just paid for two new ones from Mava. They're just as good. They help my knee arthritis so I can do squats and run more.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Tried these the last 18 holes I walked and they were the best sleeves I've ever worn. My knees stayed warm on what was a chilly round, and they gave me incredible support and warmth, better than any other neoprene sleeves I usually wear. They were very comfortable, and, most importantly, after my 6 mile round, my knees felt great! Will be ordering another pair for when I play 2 days in a row!
customer_reviews.author: sethmoe

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Was recommended to me. I do box jumps with them. Legs can last much longer. Knees don’t get tired. I feel the stability. Size to exactly what you measure. Don’t size up if you are at the high end of the measurement. I almost did, don’t need to.
customer_reviews.author: bak

customer_reviews.title: Great wraps!
customer_reviews.text: These wraps give my knees great support when squatting. There thicker than normal neoprene knee wraps and offer more protection than my Mcdavid neoprene knee wraps(which work great too) but for heavier weight I go with Mava.
customer_reviews.author: jv

customer_reviews.title: I'd Buy Them Again
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty comfortable and thick. I use the, on let day for squats and what not, but I wouldn't run in these. I am thinking about ordering a thinner pair of Mava for running. Definitely great for those of us who have hit the age of needing warm knees and don't want to to use knee wraps. I do recommend really measuring your knees and in order to pick the right pair.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Kevin W. Earley

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in largest size. Other brands I have had were that size and did fine. These were well made and great looking but after trying them on and walking around house they began to hurt. It was a tight fit but just too tight. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: FD

customer_reviews.title: Bought as gift but it didn’t fit accord to size fitting.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as the person that wanted put it on, told me it was kinda tight and when walking he just couldn’t hold feel the material on the other leg. But it’s a good product from what it supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Morazan

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping the joints warm and loose
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help with knee pain while doing light squats and plyo work. I don't see much benefit from the compression but I do like that the 7MM traps heat and seems to help keep the joints loose. I think I would get a 5MM pair in a size down to see if the compression helped, but the heat factor only makes the 7MM worth it. In short, I can notice a difference when I don't use them, especially the day after.
customer_reviews.author: Team Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Great knee sleeves, fit not consistent for both knees.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when I lost one of my previous knee sleeves 3 days before a crossfit competition. I read reviews for hours and chose mava bc of their great marketing, videos, and look. I bought the large and my right knee sleeve fits great but the left is a bit loose. More than likely its bc my legs are slightly different sizes but it is noticeable. However, these do not slip down, they are comfortable, and lifting is painless when I have them on so 5*
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft ans supportive
customer_reviews.text: I liked this item as it didn't cover well above and below the knee. It had padding to kneel on and was firm in placing it over the joint. The bottom on the calf was very tight, I walk a lot but don't have huge calves. It supported me through a day of working twists turns and knee beds but after a few hours I had to take it off due to the discomfort on the calf. Maybe in time it will loosen up
customer_reviews.author: C. D.

customer_reviews.title: extreme itching!
customer_reviews.text: let me first say that as far as support goes i give them 5 star rating. i have 2 knees that need replacements and i use compression wraps all the time. I bought yours because they looked to be very supportive, which they were! however, after wearing them for one day I developed a horrible itching on both my knees - it lasted 4 days. I used a whole tube of cortisone cream and even took medications to relieve the itching.... i cant wear them again..
customer_reviews.author: flip benack

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, Great support & Excellent breathability!
customer_reviews.text: Having knee problems, i tried a few pairs of knee sleeves and this one is the one I prefer. Felt immediately comfortable in them, not too tight but perfectly wrapped around my leg and joint making lifts that were thus far really taxing for my knees become painless. I vividly recommend. The quality is high with this product and for once the heat around my knees does not reach levels where i’d be forced to slide them down between each set.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Pulled apart at the seams, WAY TOO EARLY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my 2nd set of MAVA Knee Sleeves. I really liked my first set, and this set was nice, but the particular pair I have came apart at the seams only 4 months after purchasing them. I will probably buy from a different manufacturer to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: ... used them for about a week now and I love them. I am rehabbing a knee injury and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used them for about a week now and I love them. I am rehabbing a knee injury and these have allowed me to train without pain and, I believe, are adding to a quicker rehabilitation. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because I only used them for a short time. I have no doubt that if I were to rate theses in another couple of weeks or month it would easily be a 5+
customer_reviews.author: Joe Zubiena

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. I bought these because I really like this brand for my grips. But these didnt fit right or provide the right support. They were too tight and too difficult to pull on and off. I have worn them for two weeks thinking I could break them in, but the just don't fit right. I did measure before I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best choice I've made for my knees
customer_reviews.text: This knee sleeve is amazing. The best choice I've made for my knees and legs. They're sturdy yet flexible. And they dont slide down at all. Very good quality. Did over 100 squats today In them and I didnt have to adjust them once. Gave me the support I needed and helped with my hip pain I ordered a medium measuring at almost 14 inch and they're definately snug but the perfect amount. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Dove

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: customer for life. Great quality, Great customer service and good prices. Thats how to make a product and a name for yourself. Thanks Mava
customer_reviews.author: Cheato

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Knees!
customer_reviews.text: Having never had knee problems until I started playing Pickleball, I was at a loss as to what to do. I tried several different knee braces, wraps, etc., and while I had relief for a short time, nothing worked long term.....UNTIL I decided to try the MAVA compression sleeves! They truly do what they advertise. Thank you so much for an affordable solution that really works. I'm playing pickleball again 4 times a week with no pain.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy F.

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of knee sleeves
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of knee sleeves. They make a tremendous difference while performing any activity that requires the bending of the knees, especially when squatting with heavy weights. They keep the knees warm and tight, exactly what I need as I'm about to turn 40 and I still power lift.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Support
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I’ve used them a few times now and are giving me great knee support while exercising and lifting weights. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: suzieo

customer_reviews.title: Must have sleeves for injured knees.
customer_reviews.text: These compression braces are awesome. I’ve bought other Mava compression sleeves but these work the best for all the training I do. I’ve recommended them to anyone I roll or fight with who have any knee problems and they have all agreed with me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not a wow for me.
customer_reviews.text: Great first few times wearing. Stretch out quick. Hold a lot of moisture. Smell really bad from package. I washed them right away
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: size up
customer_reviews.text: THese are well made and will be durable. However I went by the online measurements recommended and would have to size up. Unfortunately I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: klb

customer_reviews.title: No More Post-Workout Tendonitis
customer_reviews.text: I got these sleeves because I was recently in a car accident and now I get tendinitis flare ups in my knees after putting them under stress. As someone who is very active and works out I wanted to find a way to prevent the flare ups after leg days or participating in athletic activities. I measured myself and ordered the large. When they arrived I found they fit perfectly. Most importantly, after two consecutive days of legs, I had zero flare ups. This product was exactly what I needed with a design that feels comfortable and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trusted Brand for quality
customer_reviews.text: This is our second pair... we trust the brand and happy to get another pair. Last pair lasted over 3 years, used daily
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical odor
customer_reviews.text: Extremely strong chemical smell. I had an allergic reaction to it. I developed a rash and itch on the areas it covered and also restricted the blood flow in my legs that they were swollen below the knees. As you can see in the pics the rash on my upper legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Knee Sleeves
customer_reviews.text: These sleeves are of high quality, as good as their more expensive rivals. They've withstood the on-purpose tight fit on my knees as well as multiple machine washings without showing any signs of stress or unravelling. Perfect knee support for legs with nerve problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to measure for the correct size.
customer_reviews.text: I got these knee sleeves based on a recommendation from my trainer. Definitely follow the sizing information. I’ve been using them now for 2 weeks and my knees feel great. Good support and I’m more confident under weight for squats, deadlift and leg press work. They are comfortable with the right amount of compressive support. Definitely recommend these for knee support when lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: give good support to the knee
customer_reviews.text: First the knee sleeve felt hard and stiff, but once put it on and tried it, it felt very good on the knee. It supported my knee and my movement was good., except it's a bit thick. It's very helpful to my knee.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R

customer_reviews.title: Dont let the price fool you
customer_reviews.text: You look at the price and think man should I risk it I'm here to say yes go ahead and buy these they are awesome very supportive but not restrictive I wish they would roll at the top but hey I have fat thighs and they roll a bit but dont move so I'm going to call that a win
customer_reviews.author: Jose Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not enough HEAT!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst knee support I’ve ever used. They are way too tight and thick. I should have sent them back
customer_reviews.author: Pat Mack

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Been using the sleeves for months now. Needed them for my heavy workouts on the leg press and squat machine. My knees used to hurt after my heavy workouts. Now I don't have any problems the day after.
customer_reviews.author: Shilup

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for intermediate lifter.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for intermediate lifter and great product support. Quickly approaching my 60's and never having used any knee support, I am really happy with these sleeves and feel they will help me continue to strength training as I get older. I do not not typically use them in deadlifting but they are an excellent substitution for deadlifting socks if you scrape your shins a lot like me.
customer_reviews.author: SQLMonkey

customer_reviews.title: These are super tight
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend going a size up if youre questionable or close in sizing but these are great quality and they hold everything together.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Bates

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. I am an in between size
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. I am an in between size. If I went up a size they would not give me enough support. The binding is a little tight around the top and bottom, but I can wear them for short periods of time. I like the convenience of the slip on sleeve, but it would be nice if there was an adjustment band with velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Charmed I'm Sure

customer_reviews.title: Athletic Support for a knee that has been fully replaced
customer_reviews.text: Athletic support for a knee that has been fully replaced, and training to do a Tough Mudder race. Used by a 56 year-old male (not the review writer) Ther user reports: These sleeves provide great support in the movement needed for me to excel in my training. I can also squat and get on my knees in positions that I couldn't without the Pro Knee Sleeve on.
customer_reviews.author: VAG802

customer_reviews.title: Awesome supporr
customer_reviews.text: I dislocated both knees and tore both patella tendon. I've been looking for the best supporting knee brace possible and this is it. Love how my knees feel when I train.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: We Skwaaaating!!
customer_reviews.text: These for me are great! This is my second pair and I like the firmness of the sleeves and they are not super thick. I wear them each time I work out due to knee stability issues. They are great for squats.
customer_reviews.author: SugaDicDaddy

customer_reviews.title: The best knee sleeves I have worn by far
customer_reviews.text: The best knee sleeves I have worn by far. As a former competitive power lifter I have worn all type of knee wraps and sleeves. I bought Mava’s when I started crossfit. I couldn’t be happier with my choice. I get great support and Protection from these knee sleeves and I highly recommend them to anyone looking for maximum protection and support.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic J. Licavoli

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the support and comfort these provide. Had been using Tommy Kao's but these are so much easier to put on and remove and much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: W88s

customer_reviews.title: Too tight at first but helping me
customer_reviews.text: These were too tight at first but after wearing them for a while they felt better. I like that they don't slip down. I am giving them for stars because they are very thick. I know that is a feature but you cannot wear them under jeans which I was hoping but will mostly use them on my hikes anyway so I can wear my loose hiking pants. I am trying to put off me surgery as long as I can so these will help me
customer_reviews.author: CrazyGranny

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise very good and keeps my knees warm throughout the workout
customer_reviews.text: These knee sleeves work very well, but the logo is peeling off after 1 use. Not a huge issue but I would think it would have lasted longer than 1 day at the gym. Otherwise very good and keeps my knees warm throughout the workout.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my son
customer_reviews.text: have not given it to him yet because it was a birthday gift. Cannot tell you any more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Venter

customer_reviews.title: The Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fit & comfort! I got this in a pair of red for my workout sessions and also to protect my knee recovering from a meniscus tear recently..it stays on put & does its job above & beyond! Love these knee sleeve compressions to the moon & back...Thanks Amazon as always...👍
customer_reviews.author: Dazzling Diamonds

customer_reviews.title: works for me
customer_reviews.text: Very snug, but gives great support. Really help my 68 year old knees. Enhances mobility and reduces knee squawking. More fun, less limitation. Knees feel great after workout (biking, racketball) too. Glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Reiner

customer_reviews.title: THICK
customer_reviews.text: THEY WERE TOO THICK FOR ME BEING THAT THICK MADE IT REALLY UNCOMFORTABLE TO WEAR
customer_reviews.author: Steven Teague

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stretch.
customer_reviews.text: It didnt stretch much, couldnt even put it on. I tried a few times. I pulled, but then started causing me knee pain from trying it get it on.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Very nice when deadlifting
customer_reviews.text: Sizing chart seems right on. I do get some bunching if wearing when doing leg extensions but not really where they shine. Very nice when deadlifting, can't comment on squats as the ole knees are too bad to get down there. They have definitely allowed me to deadlift where, prior to getting them, my knees just couldn't take it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ceruzzi

product_meta.title: Mava Sports Pair of Knee Compression Sleeves Neoprene 7mm for Men & Women for Cross Training WOD, Squats, Gym Workout, Powerlifting, Weightlifting
feature_bullets: UNMATCHED CUSTOMER SUPPORT: If you didn’t get the right size or the color you wanted, please contact us and we will take care of everything ASAP. We answer all our messages in less than 12 hours so you’re in good hands. We pride ourselves with offering unmatched customer support!
7mm THICK that actually offers Support - Our Pair of Knee Compression is Proven to help with INJURY PREVENTION, promoting muscle and joint health, offering optimal muscle support during wear.

ANATOMICALLY SHAPED FOR PERFORMANCE - They provide the right amount of support and compression without feeling cumbersome or uncomfortable . Achieve more from your sessions with these strong neoprene knee sleeves. NOT for all day use !

EXTRA SUPPORT & STABILITY - relieving muscle stiffness and soreness, providing that little help with pain and knee discomfort, arthritis, osteoporosis, tendonitis . Their unique design provides the best support for heavy squats, cross training, wods, gym workouts, powerlifting, rowing, burpees, lunges, heavy lifting, machine, deadlift, leg presses and high intensity weight lifting.

SIZING CHART - Please check it for a perfect fit and superior comfort. Do NOT order a size down since it won't give you better compression. These are suitable for both men and women and available in multiple colors. MATERIAL COMPOSITION: 100% neoprene
